column4: Using MacOSX on Macbook. want to get Ubuntu on Qemu. what version? 6.10 or 6.06 LTS?? the latest version is said to be "supported to 2008", yet the older one seem to be "supported to 2009"... How come. Btw, I am a linux newb. thanks.
oh and what kind of processor do I select? my macbook isn't on the list...
LTS = Long time support, I think.. so 6.06 is kind of the stable version of ubuntu or something
